name: Virtual Links
description:
Control the player, who has its brain linked to his other brothers, enabling him to see through the eyes of each person. Virtual Links is a 2D, Topdown, Survival game where you play as all five of the brothers and try to get the highest score by killing bats and staying alive! 

Shoot the bats using your mouse (left click). Watch your ammo! If your ammo goes to zero, you will have to reload before killing more bats. Right Click!

Identify which brother's eye you are looking from! You can toggle between each brother's eye to see what they see so that you can shoot the bats near them. The main player is always the first eye at the far left.

Touch a bat and your brother will die. Each disconnection will lead to your movement speed gradually slowing. As you start off as the main player, if the main player dies, game over.
